https://tmrev.io/movie/743199-Ballada 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/AlDTv6lgj7DmcohLNp9Z90AQGZK.jpg The film relates the cruel reality of a small mountain village. Inspired by the 100-year-old painting Il quarto stato (1901) by Giuseppe Pellizza da Volpedo, it takes the characters and situation of the painting as a starting point and creats an original fiction. Ballada
